c1.name: One More Flask!
c1.descriptionRaw: When the Purr-loined Treasure Flask from the Elemental Skill Cunning Scheme: Wealth Redistribution Plan launches a Fluffy Meowball that hits an enemy, there is a 50% chance for it to bounce, dealing the corresponding Elemental DMG to nearby enemies.

c2.name: Rogue's Quick Thinking
c2.descriptionRaw: When the party reaches Ascendant Gleam, the Elemental Buffs in Ascension Talent 1 for both the first and second most common Elemental Types in the team will take effect simultaneously.

c3.name: A Desperate Gamble
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of Secret Tool: Hunter's Seven Gadgets by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Wild Berries on the Dust
c4.descriptionRaw: When the Purr-sonal Household Helper Coordinators from the Elemental Burst Secret Tool: Hunter's Seven Gadgets undergo an Elemental Conversion, Jahoda will recover 4 Elemental Energy.

c5.name: The Greatest Treasure
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of Cunning Scheme: Wealth Redistribution Plan by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Tiniest Luck
c6.descriptionRaw: For 20s after the Purr-loined Treasure Flask in the Elemental Skill Cunning Scheme: Wealth Redistribution Plan is fully charged, Nod-Krai characters in your team gain +5% CRIT Rate and +40% CRIT DMG.
